snippet: SAPIR--Louis, of Hanover, NH, formerly of Riverdale, NY, died peacefully at age 95 on March 14. Predeceased in 2014 by his wife Carolyn Kupferberg Sapir, he is survived by his loving family, including two daughters, four grandchildren, and three great-grandchildren. A graduate of CCNY and Columbia (MA, Economics), Mr. Sapir was a securities analyst, until recently as First VP at Oppenheimer & Co in New York. He served as Chair, New York Society for Ethical Culture, and as board member of the Ethical Culture Fieldston School, Riverdale-Yonkers Society for Ethical Culture, Mt. Pleasant Cemetery, Riverdale Mental Health Association, and Weis Ecology Center. He was also an Adjunct Professor at Manhattan College School of Business. Contributions may be made to The Elinor M. Ristuccia Fund, Massachusetts Advocates for Children, 25 Kingston St., 2nd Floor, Boston, MA 02111. For funeral and tribute information, please visit www.rand-wilson.com. 1/3
